categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic audiobooks

nodes.text: The High Republic: The Fallen Star (audiobook)

The High Republic: The Fallen Star is the forthcoming unabridged audio version of the canon novel of the same name, written by Claudia Gray. The audiobook is scheduled to be released by Random House Audio on January 18, 2022.
In this gripping sequel to Star Wars: The Rising Storm, the light of the Jedi faces its darkest hour.
Star Wars: The Fallen Star (The High Republic) on Penguin Random House's official website (backup link)
